errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that llvmlite is only compatible with Python 3.9, when it actually supports versions 3.9 through 3.12.
correction_candidates: llvmlite has been tested with Python 3.9 -- 3.12 and is likely to work with greater versions.
llvmlite has been tested with Python 3.7 -- 3.12 and is likely to work with greater versions.
llvmlite has been tested with Python 3.9 and higher.
llvmlite is compatible with any Python 3.x version.
errors.golden_answer: llvmlite has been tested with Python 3.9 -- 3.12 and is likely to work with greater versions.

errors.error_description: The URL for the installation documentation contains an incorrect path segment ('install/installation.html' instead of 'install/index.html').
